story.book.view

Class EditStoryInformationActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • story.book.view.EditStoryInformationActivity

  • public class EditStoryInformationActivity
extends Activity
    Activity that allows the user to edit the information of their story or enter information for their newly created story.
    Author:
    Nancy Pham-Nguyen, Vina Nguyen
